subject: Order #SSN4353 The baseplate is missing and the brake pedal is making loud noises.
description_text:
Hello, my pedals from order #SSN4353 are missing the baseplate completely, and the brake pedal makes a very loud noise. It sounds like metal is hitting metal, coming from the damper. Is this normal? If so, I would like to cancel the purchase. Alternatively, I would like a new set of pedals where the brake pedal doesn't make this noise.

Sincerely, Sven Hoffmann


Von meinem/meiner Galaxy gesendet

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 9987 中
